sentences: Ramadan Sokoli (14 June 1920 – 12 March 2008) was an Albanian ethnomusicologist, musician, composer and writer.
Ramadan Sokoli was born on June 14, 1920 in Shkodër.
He graduated from the elementary and highschool of Shkodër before moving to Florence to study musicology.
Sokoli is considered to be a pioneer of Albanian ethnomusicology.
